text: Clarence Larkin (born 28 October 1850 ) at Chester Pennsylvania U.s , and died (on 24 January 1924) was an American Baptist pastor and Bible teacher and the author whose writings on Dispensational truth had a great impact on Conservative Protestant Reformation visual Culture in the 20 Century.https://www.preservedwords.comhttps://www.bibleanalyzer.com == References == Category:1850 births Category:1924 deaths Category:American Baptist ministers
title: Clarence Larkin
